name: Hexapawn (Mini Schach)
overview: The game Mini Chess is a game played with a 3 x 3 square board and pawn pieces. The figures are drawn like these (one field forward to enter an empty space, or diagonally to strike an opposing figure). They play with the black stones against the computer. At first, the computer only recognizes when the game is over. He learns to make sense in several games. Therefore, you also have to figure out by playing how to win. The won games are then displayed under the playing field! Are you ready to play?
